sentence: Trump is supporting weak candidates like Herschel Walker, and perhaps deterring stronger ones from even running (GA, NH & PA come to mind).
title: Democrats' Chances of Winning the Senate just Rose to 51.5%, the Highest since Virginia. Here's why:

sentence: Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker waltzed through his Georgia primary on Tuesday.
author: Caleb Ecarma
title: The GOP Needs Trump-Loving Football Champ Herschel Walker to Be Teflon
